utils-merge

Merges the properties from a source object into a destination object.

Install 

$ npm install utils-merge

Usage 

var a = { foo: 'bar' }
  , b = { bar: 'baz' };

merge(a, b);
// => { foo: 'bar', bar: 'baz' }

Tests 

$ npm install
$ npm test

Credits

  • Jared Hanson
